column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////THIS...IS...PIZZA...PERIOD!  I've been to several Chicago locations
column3: it is my favorite pizza restaurant in America.  I know many Americans prefer thin crust
column5: but I have to vehemently disagree with them.  Lou's is the place to go in Chicago
column6: and I wish they had a few restaurants in South Florida.  Yes
column7: I know you can have a pie shipped to you
column8: but nothing beats a fresh pie at the actual restaurant.
